name: Samsung CCTV Video Information File
summary: Learn about .DB2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DB2 files are saved with BU files in the same directory and have the same filename, expect for the extension. For example, a video recording may generate the files 12300000.bu and 12300000.db2. These files should not be separated since they are both read by Samsung video recording software.

description: Video information file generated by a Samsung CCTV recording system; contains information about a corresponding .BU video file.
